summary: This module implements the Pseudo Numerical Diffusion Model (PNDM) scheduler, offering deterministic sampling for diffusion-based generative models. It defines an enumeration for supported prediction strategies (noise and velocity) and a scheduler class that computes the diffusion steps, manages timesteps, and updates latent variables during inference.
business_intent: Enable fast and reliable generation of synthetic medical images by providing an optimized diffusion scheduler that integrates with the MONAI framework for research and clinical applications.
